description: Inconsummate numbers in base 11: no number is this multiple of the sum of its digits (in base 11).
maple: digitsum := proc (n,b) local i; add(i,i=convert(n,base,b)) end; b := 11:N := 43922; L := []: for n from 1 to N do k := digitsum(n,b): if (n mod k)=0 then L := [op(L), n/k] fi: od: M := []: for i from 1 to 1000 do if not(member(i,L)) then M := [op(M),i] fi od: lprint(M);
mathematica: base = 11; Do[k = n; While[ Apply[ Plus, IntegerDigits[k, base] ]*n != k && k < 250n, k += n]; If[k == 250n, Print[n] ], {n, 1, 10^3} ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 09 2001
